name: Bright Minds Support
shortDescription: Expert help for children with dyslexia.
longDescription: Bright Minds Support provides personalized programs for children with dyslexia, focusing on literacy and self-confidence.

name: Focus First Coaching
shortDescription: Tailored ADHD coaching for kids and teens.
longDescription: Focus First offers one-on-one coaching for children with ADHD to improve attention, time management, and study skills.

name: Calm Steps
longDescription: Calm Steps supports families and children with autism through structured therapy and early intervention strategies.

name: LearnEase
longDescription: LearnEase designs programs for children with general learning difficulties, using a mix of technology and hands-on methods.

name: Mind Pathways
longDescription: Mind Pathways offers therapy sessions that target emotional regulation, social skills, and behavioral strategies.
